RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 91. Starter Allowance Purse 17600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 15 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CURT'S ANGEL sprinted out and quickly made the lead, was nicely rated on the front end, led throughout and widened late while being ridden out. HOT DAME chased the winner throughout, could not gain late but held place. RAGTIME DOLLY was allowed to settle early, rallied in the stretch three wide and finished well. SPECIAL BEACH had good position on the inside, lacked a bid and went evenly. PETTIGO GIRL never far back while racing four wide, lacked a late response. SEAWARD had good position early and tired on the far turn. ON A TOUR was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Hot Dame
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased the winner throughout, could not gain late but held place,

ENTRY.NAME: Seaward
ENTRY.COMMENT: had good position early and tired on the far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Curt's Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted out and quickly made the lead, was nicely rated on the g

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 12800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE AUGUST 15. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEACH FRONT had good position early, rallied in the stretch and drew even, drew off late under strong handling. APACHE raced mid pack early, rallied in the stretch four wide and closed fast to be second best. SPECTACULAR ROAD set the pace until mid stretch and faltered late. KHALFANI broke in the air, contended three wide and tired in the lane. BALTIC FLEET was unhurried early and was no menace late. KEYED ON TOP chased early and quickly gave way.

ENTRY.COMMENT: was unhurried early, and was no menace

ENTRY.OWNER: The Estate of Frank F Romocean
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early and quickly gave way,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 36. Maiden Claiming Purse 19500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UPTOWN MILLIE was bumped leaving the gate and settled early while racing wide, rallied on the turn three wide with a quick move, drew clear in mid stretch and remained clear late under strong handling. OHIO LADY was well placed early, rallied in the stretch four wide, finished willingly and was second best. TITEBLUEJEANS raced mid pack early, swung wide in the stretch and had a mild bid. SHANGHAI ROYALTY allowed to settle, failed to menace. DEE'S KY WILDCAT saved ground and was outrun. WICKED REESE dueled on the lead for a half, then gave way. HONEYBEE STINGS dueled on the lead and tired in the stretch. SEE YA SISTA well placed early, dropped back in the stretch.

Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 15 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowanc es).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIL RICKYS JEWEL set the early pace, repulsed a bid in mid stretch, drew clear late under left handed urging. INTO GOLD chased the winner throughout, rallied on the far turn, drew even in mid stretch, was outfinished late but was clearly second best. UNBRIDLED CAUSE tracked three wide and went evenly late. TEQUILA FLATS had good position on the inside and had no late rally. ROLLIN SO PERFECT allowed to settle, failed to menace. WHISKEY HELPS was outrun.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: TURNING PAGES dueled on the lead for a half, shook clear at the top of the stretch and drew off late under strong handling. PECKS NOT BAD raced wide early, rallied on the turn four wide, finished well and was second best. MUCHO PRIMO raced close up throughout and gradually weakened. DEXQUIRE was allowed to settle early, swung wide in the stretch and had a mild bid. THE PINK Z had good position on the inside and lacked a late response. HONKY TONK MUSIC allowed to settle, saved ground, and was no threat. SERENDIPITOUS was no factor. COUNTRY RUCKUS pressed the pace until the top of the stretch, then gave way.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: ASTRO JAK dueled on the lead for a half, shook clear in mid stretch and drew off late under left handed urging. UNCLE EARL vied for the lead three wide, was no match late for the winner bur held place. RONNI'S STORM dueled on the lead from the inside and weakened. MAGICAL EXPRESS never far back, lacked a late response and went evenly. GOTTAGETITBACK contended early and was through after a half. EXECUTIVE SIGHT was outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 84. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 15 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LUCY'S LOOKIN LEFT was never far back, rallied, four wide in the stretch, closed fast and was along in time. LOADED ONCE MORE was unhurried early, rallied in the stretch, finished well and just missed. CLIFTONS BALLERINA pressed early, rallied in the stretch and gained the lead and was caught late. SQUID had good position throughout and needed more late. FIRST KITTEN set the pace for a half and weakened. DOMITIA LUCILLA allowed to settle, saved ground and was no menace. INDY PRINCESS KOKO raced inside and was no threat. THE DEVIL'S DREAM had brief foot, and was through after a half.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 68. Allowance Purse 35100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 15 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Consider ed In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ANGEL WINGS raced wide early, rallied on the far turn three wide, closed determinedly and was up in the final strides. MOBIL CHIC dueled on the lead throughout, held stubbornly after a long battle and just missed. SENORA PANQUEQUES dueled on the lead and weakened late. NO TWOWAYSABOUTIT had good position on the inside and went evenly. STATE OF GRACE raced mid pack and went evenly. CAN I GO TOO was unhurried early, swung wide in the stretch and was no threat. LA ROSA dueled three wide and weakened in the stretch. LUCKY PENNY ROSE hopped at the start, had no speed and trailed.
